industry_analysis.average_gross_margin: NVIDIA DC: >70%; AMD DC: ~50-60%; Intel: Negative/Near Zero
industry_analysis.cost_trend: Increasing (Advanced Node Premium, CoWoS Shortage, HBM3 Cost)

last_updated: 2024-04-15 (Based on Q1 2024 earnings reports & analyst notes)
data_caveats: Costs are analyst estimates, not official figures
R&D allocation cannot be accurately calculated per unit
Retail prices vary massively by volume, partner, region, and configuration
Intel Arc consumer GPU costs are not meaningfully disclosed
TSMC/Samsung foundry pricing is negotiated per client and confidential
